tspan.tspan: SVC0 is advertised through VLAN0 and the BR-EX bridge.

text.tspan: SVC1 is advertised through VLAN1 as defined in the BGPAdvertisement CR with IPAddressPool1 and BGPPeer1 fields configured.

tspan.tspan: SVC2 is advertised through VLAN2 as defined in the BGPAdvertisement CR with IPAddressPool2 and BGPPeer2 fields configured.
